name: touchup
description: Enhances various aspects of the GNOME experience when using a touch device.
author: mityax

scripts.enable: npm run build && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/touchup@mityax.zip && gnome-extensions enable touchup@mityax && echo '✅ Successfully installed and enabled debug build.'
scripts.enable:release: npm run build:release && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/touchup@mityax.zip && gnome-extensions enable touchup@mityax && echo '✅ Successfully installed and enabled release build.'
scripts.watch: npm run build && rollup -c --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 3.5s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch; kill $pid
scripts.watch:verbose: npm run build && rollup -c --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 3.5s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --verbose; kill $pid
scripts.watch-tty: npm run build && rollup -c --watch  & pid="$!"; sleep 3.5s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --tty; kill $pid
scripts.watch-tty:verbose: npm run build && rollup -c --watch  & pid="$!"; sleep 3.5s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch --tty --verbose; kill $pid
scripts.prefs: npm run enable && gnome-extensions prefs touchup@mityax
